JAIME ARON AP Pro Football Writer NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell is not concerned about Michael Vick being billed as hosting a Super Bowl party because the Eagles quarterback told him it's not true. He has said that on numerous occasions people have been using his name about being involved in some type of a party and he had no intention of participating in that, Roger Goodell said. Here's the passage from Donald Rumsfeld 's`` Known and Unkwown'': After his sons were killed, there was an intelligence report that Saddam Hussein was paying$ 60 million for his agents to target the President Bush 's two daughters and my two daughters for reprisal attacks. That threat report was brought up at an NSC meeting in October 2003. I acknowledged it, but went on with our discussion. `` You need to take this seriously,'' President Bush said.
